line_2: And endure what can't be mended.

line_1: Myself and you: And much offended
line_2: (It seems) at what was there intended.

line_1: If with my greatness you 're offended,
Deserves not, if so soon offended,
line_2: Much to be pitied or commended.

line_1: I beg by my scrawl, sir, you'll not be offended;
line_2: No more I'll insist, lest your patience be ended;
